findings.title: A01.Unprotected function approveMax allowing unlimited approval
findings.description: The approveMax function allows unlimited approval without any protection or validation, potentially leading to unauthorized access and manipulation of assets.

findings.title: Possible reentrancy vulnerability in transfer and transferFrom functions
findings.description: The finding suggests a potential reentrancy vulnerability in the transfer and transferFrom functions which could lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: A03.Insecure use of msg.sender for critical operations
findings.description: Insecure use of msg.sender can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of critical operations.

findings.title: A04.Unsafe use of address(0) as a default value
findings.description: Using address(0) as a default value can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: A05.Missing access modifiers for certain variables
findings.description: The contract has variables without specified access modifiers, which can lead to unintended accessibility and potential security risks.

findings.title: Potential uninitialized variable _totalSupply
findings.description: _totalSupply may not be initialized before it is used in certain operations, potentially leading to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: A07.Lack of input validation in function parameters
findings.description: The functions setBuybackMultiplierSettings, setIsDividendExempt, setIsFeeExempt, setBuyBacker, and setFees do not validate their input parameters, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: A08.Inadequate use of require statements for input validation
findings.description: The SafeMath contract does not adequately utilize require statements for input validation, potentially leading to incorrect results or reverts.

findings.title: A09.Unprotected function allowance allowing unlimited approval
findings.description: The approveMax function allows unlimited approval without proper checks, enabling unauthorized access and potential attacks.

findings.title: Insecure use of unverified external contracts
findings.description: The contract uses unverified external contracts IUniswapV2Router02 and IUniswapV2Factory without proper verification, which can lead to potential security risks.
